alert.note: Alert for Hubbard; South Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:44PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hubbard and southeastern Beltrami Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 344 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Puposky, or 13 miles northwest of Bemidji, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Puposky around 350 PM CDT. Wilton around 405 PM CDT. Bemidji and Turtle River around 410 PM CDT. Lavinia around 415 PM CDT. Rosby around 430 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
